author: Bob Davis, Heather Haddon
title: Big Restaurant, Hotel Chains Won Exemption to Get Small Business Loans - The Wall Street Journal
description: The Paycheck Protection Program is aimed at businesses with 500 or fewer employees, but large restaurant and hotel chains can participate regardless of how many people they employ
content:
Shake Shack Inc. hardly seems like a small enterprise, with 7,600 employees, about $500 million in annual revenue and net income last year of $24 million. Even so, it plans to apply for a new government-guaranteed small-business loan.
The New York-based fast… [+270 chars]
